headline: Palo Alto Networks: Strong Execution, Stretched Valuation
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. is rated Hold with revenue growth remains resilient, driven by SASE, XSIAM. Learn more about PANW stock here.

headline: Missed the AI Rally? Jefferies Says CrowdStrike and These 3 Other Cybersecurity Stocks Could Be Next
summary: Cybersecurity stocks have trailed the tech rally, but Jefferies sees 2026 as the year market leaders begin to separate from the pack.

headline: How The Palo Alto Deal Is Rewriting The Story For CyberArk Software (CYBR) Investors
summary: The updated fair value estimate for CyberArk Software edges from about US$485.47 to roughly US$487.74 per share, with the discount rate sitting near 10.83% and revenue growth expectations refined from around 18.60% to about 18.62%. This small move reflects a tug of war between upbeat views on the Palo Alto Networks tie up, AI related security interest, and more cautious commentary around limited upside versus the agreed takeover terms and possible investor rotation into other cybersecurity...
